name: AuraAir
0:
”Alexa, open aura air”
”Alexa, ask aura air to get indoor air quality”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: aura air
Developer Terms of Use
des: You can use this skill to ask questions about air quality status indoor and outdoor and get personal health recommendations for outdoor activities. The information in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only. It is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment or diagnosis. Call your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number
